alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 28 at 6:21PM CDT until April 28 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL LINCOLN AND SOUTHEASTERN BROOKINGS COUNTIES... At 620 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Elkton, or 16 miles east of Brookings, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 618 PM, quarter size hail was reported in Bushnell. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Hendricks around 635 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Bushnell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
